thread.title: Bitcoin’s First-Quarter Play: Falling Back to Earth

author: Paul Vigna
title: Bitcoin’s First-Quarter Play: Falling Back to Earth
text:
The first quarter was a prime example of why investors shouldn’t get too excited about bitcoin.
The digital currency has always been prone to wild price swings, pushed around by news flow and investors’ rapidly changing sentiment. In 2017, those trends pushed the price of bitcoin 1,375% higher. This year, they have reversed sharply.
Bitcoin...
